languages.text: {n}Повстанец смотрит на вас с легким сомнением.{/n} "Ну посмотрим, как пойдет. Хоть вы и {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusHarsh}прижали{/d} наших... да, если по справедливости, мы же все ж своими бунтами закон {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g} нарушили. Так что пускай так будет, да".

traits.locale_text: {n}Богул смотрит на вас с легким сомнением.{/n} "Правильно сказал{mf||а}, что люди людьми править должны... хоть вы и прижали наших... да, если по справедливости, мы же все ж своими бунтами закон Империума нарушили. Так что пускай так будет, да".

languages.text: {n}The rebel looks at you with a hint of doubt.{/n} "We'll see. You may have {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusHarsh}stuck it{/d} to us... but, to be fair, we did break the law of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} with all our riots. So let's try it this way."
languages.original_text: {n}Повстанец смотрит на вас с легким сомнением.{/n} "Ну посмотрим, как пойдет. Хоть вы и {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusHarsh}прижали{/d} наших... да, если по справедливости, мы же все ж своими бунтами закон {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g} нарушили. Так что пускай так будет, да".

traits.locale_text: {n}The rebel looks at you with a hint of doubt.{/n} "We'll see. You may have stuck it to us... but, to be fair, we did break the law of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} with all our riots. So let's try it this way."

{n}Bogul looks at you with a hint of doubt.{/n} "You said it right, you did — Humans should rule over Humans... you may have stuck it to us... but, to be fair, we did break the law of the Imperium with all our riots. So that's how it'll go. Right. Just, uh... when you're done with the governor, go easy on the survivors, will you? Good cause and all that."

{n}The rebel looks at you with a hint of doubt.{/n} "We'll see. You may have stuck it to us... but, to be fair, we did break the law of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} with all our riots. So let's try it this way."

{n}Bogul looks at you with a hint of doubt.{/n} "You said it right, you did — humans should rule over humans... you may have stuck it to us... but, to be fair, we did break the law of the Imperium with all our riots. So that's how it'll go. Right. Just, uh... when you're done with the governor, go easy on the survivors, will you? Good cause and all that."

{n}Bogul looks at you with a hint of doubt.{/n} "You said it right, you did — humans should rule over humans... you may have stuck it to us... but, to be fair, we did break the law of the Imperium with all our riots. So that's how it'll go. Right."

{n}Bogul looks at you with a hint of doubt.{/n} "You said it right, you did — humans should rule over humans... you may have stuck it to us... but, to be fair, we did break the law of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} with all our riots. So that's how it'll go. Right."

{n}The rebel looks at you with a hint of doubt.{/n} "We'll see. You may have stuck it to us... but, to be fair, we did break the law of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} with all our riots. So let's try it this way."

{n}The rebel looks at you with a hint of doubt.{/n} "We'll see. You may have stuck it to us... but, to be fair, we did break the law of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} with all our riots. So let's try it this way."

languages.text: {n}叛军士兵看着你，目光中带着一丝疑惑。{/n}“我们走着瞧吧。或许你确实对我们很{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusHarsh}严苛{/d}……但说到底，我们的暴乱行为也确实违背了{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的法律。所以，咱们用这个方法来试试吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}The rebel looks at you with a hint of doubt.{/n} "We'll see. You may have {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusHarsh}stuck it{/d} to us... but, to be fair, we did break the law of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} with all our riots. So let's try it this way."

traits.locale_text: {n}叛军士兵看着你，目光中带着一丝疑惑。{/n}“我们走着瞧吧。或许你确实对我们很严苛……但说到底，我们的暴乱行为也确实违背了{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的法律。所以，咱们用这个方法来试试吧。”

languages.text: {n}反乱者は疑い混じりにの視線を向けてくる。{/n}「わかった。あんたの{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusHarsh}仕打ち{/d}はひどいもんだったかもしれない…だが、お互い様だ。俺ら反乱軍はみんな、たしかに{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}法を破ったんだ。その方法でやってみよう」
languages.original_text: {n}The rebel looks at you with a hint of doubt.{/n} "We'll see. You may have {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusHarsh}stuck it{/d} to us... but, to be fair, we did break the law of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} with all our riots. So let's try it this way."

traits.locale_text: {n}反乱者は疑い混じりにの視線を向けてくる。{/n}「わかった。あんたの{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusHarsh}仕打ち{/d}はひどいもんだったかもしれない…だが、お互い様だ。俺ら反乱軍はみんな、たしかに{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}法を破ったんだ。その方法でやってみよう」

languages.text: {n}Der Rebell blickt dich leicht zweifelnd an.{/n} "Wir werden sehen. Ihr habt uns zwar {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusHarsh}getadelt{/d} ... aber um ehrlich zu sein, wir haben das Gesetz des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} mit unseren Aufständen tatsächlich gebrochen. Also wollen wir es jetzt mal so versuchen."
languages.original_text: {n}The rebel looks at you with a hint of doubt.{/n} "We'll see. You may have {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusHarsh}stuck it{/d} to us... but, to be fair, we did break the law of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} with all our riots. So let's try it this way."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Rebell blickt dich leicht zweifelnd an.{/n} "Wir werden sehen. Ihr habt uns zwar getadelt ... aber um ehrlich zu sein, wir haben das Gesetz des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} mit unseren Aufständen tatsächlich gebrochen. Also wollen wir es jetzt mal so versuchen."

languages.text: {n}Le rebelle vous lance un regard légèrement méfiant.{/n} « On verra. Vous nous avez donné une {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusHarsh}leçon{/d}... mais il faut bien avouer qu'on avait enfreint la loi de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} avec toutes nos émeutes. Essayons de procéder comme ça, alors. »
languages.original_text: {n}The rebel looks at you with a hint of doubt.{/n} "We'll see. You may have {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusHarsh}stuck it{/d} to us... but, to be fair, we did break the law of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} with all our riots. So let's try it this way."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le rebelle vous lance un regard légèrement méfiant.{/n} « On verra. Vous nous avez donné une leçon... mais il faut bien avouer qu'on avait enfreint la loi de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} avec toutes nos émeutes. Essayons de procéder comme ça, alors. »

languages.text: {n}El rebelde te mira con una sombra de duda.{/n} «Ya veremos. Puede que nos la hayas {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusHarsh}jugado{/d}... pero, la verdad, nuestras revueltas iban en contra de la ley del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Vamos a probar así».
languages.original_text: {n}The rebel looks at you with a hint of doubt.{/n} "We'll see. You may have {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusHarsh}stuck it{/d} to us... but, to be fair, we did break the law of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} with all our riots. So let's try it this way."

traits.locale_text: {n}El rebelde te mira con una sombra de duda.{/n} «Ya veremos. Puede que nos la hayas jugado... pero, la verdad, nuestras revueltas iban en contra de la ley del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Vamos a probar así».

languages.text: {n}İsyancı, kuşkulu bir ifadeyle sana bakıyor.{/n} "Ne olacak göreceğiz. İbretiâlem olsun diye {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusHarsh}yapacağını yaptın{/d}. Eğri oturup doğru konuşmak gerekirse biz de isyan çıkarıp {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g} yasalarını çiğnemiştik. Bir de böylesini deneyelim bakalım."
languages.original_text: {n}The rebel looks at you with a hint of doubt.{/n} "We'll see. You may have {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusHarsh}stuck it{/d} to us... but, to be fair, we did break the law of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} with all our riots. So let's try it this way."

traits.locale_text: {n}İsyancı, kuşkulu bir ifadeyle sana bakıyor.{/n} "Ne olacak göreceğiz. İbretiâlem olsun diye yapacağını yaptın. Eğri oturup doğru konuşmak gerekirse biz de isyan çıkarıp {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g} yasalarını çiğnemiştik. Bir de böylesini deneyelim bakalım."
